co.cask.cdap.api.data.batch

Class RecordScanner<RECORD>

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cask.cdap.api.data.batch.RecordScanner<RECORD>
  • Type Parameters:
    RECORD - the type of objects that represents a single record

    @Beta
public abstract class RecordScanner<RECORD>
extends Object
    Defines a reader of a dataset Split.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public abstract void initialize(Split split)
                         throws InterruptedException
        Called once at initialization.
        Parameters:
        split - The split that defines the range of records to read.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • nextRecord

        public abstract boolean nextRecord()
                            throws InterruptedException
        Read the next record.
        Returns:
        true if a record was read.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • getCurrentRecord

        public abstract RECORD getCurrentRecord()
                                 throws InterruptedException
        Get the current record.
        Returns:
        The current record, or null if there is no current record.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • getProgress

        public float getProgress()
                  throws InterruptedException
        The current progress of the record reader through its data. By default progress is not reported in the middle of split reading.
        Returns:
        A number between 0.0 and 1.0 that is the fraction of the data that has been read.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • close

        public abstract void close()
        Close the record reader.
